summary: Renames the circlets to be consistent with other jewelry; for example, "Gold and Emerald Circlet" is now "Gold Emerald Circlet"
descriptionHtml:
[center][b][size=2]Renamed Circlets[/size][/b][/center]

The way circlets are named has always bugged me. Most jewelry was in the format of, say, "Gold Emerald Ring". Not so with circlets; they were in the format of "Gold and Emerald Circlet." I decided I would find a mod that renamed them by removing the redundant "and" in the name since I figured it would already have been done. Surprisingly, I found none - at least, none that I saw - which led me to create this mod.

Only requirement is that you have the [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19]Unofficial Skyrim Patch[/url], as this mod incorporates some of its bug fixes. Can also be merged with a Bashed Patch to keep the plugin count down.

Other recommended jewelry related mods:
 * [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6495]Better circlets HQ[/url]
 * [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27038]Jewels of the Nord - HD rings and necklaces[/url]
 * [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/8361]Expanded Jewelry Crafting[/url]
 * [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4417]Craftable Circlets[/url]

[b]Like this mod? Please endorse![/b]
author: tobiasmar
